summary: This document is an email chain involving several individuals discussing the movement of securities in Southern Financial and Southern Trust. It includes internal communications from Deutsche Bank employees, indicating the handling of financial positions and securities transfers.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is the primary sender of the email and is involved in the discussion regarding the movement of securities.

persons.name: Paul Morris
persons.context: Paul Morris is the recipient of the forwarded email from Tazia Smith.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian
persons.context: Vahe Stepanian forwards an email regarding the securities movement to Tazia Smith.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby initiates the email chain discussing the movement of securities.

connections.description: Both are employees at Deutsche Bank, with Tazia forwarding Vahe's email.
Tazia Smith is involved in the email chain initiated by Amanda Kirby regarding securities.
Vahe Stepanian forwards Amanda Kirby's email about the securities movement.

keyFacts: The document is an email chain discussing the movement of securities in Southern Financial and Southern Trust.
Tazia Smith is the Director I Key Client Partners at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc.
The email chain includes discussions about positions being ACAT (Automated Customer Account Transfer).
The communication is classified as confidential and for internal use only.
The document contains embedded images and attachments related to the securities discussed.
